languages.text: {n}Друкари едва заметно морщится.{/n} "Надеюсь, кто бы ни ждал по ту сторону, варп-чары не отняли у него способности бояться. И испытывать боль".
{n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари едва заметно морщится.{/n} "Надеюсь, кто бы ни ждал по ту сторону, варп-чары не отняли у него способности бояться. И испытывать боль".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋微微皱起了眉。{/n}“不管里面的人是谁，我只希望亚空间的巫术不会削弱他感受恐惧的能力……或体验痛苦的能力。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋微微皱起了眉。{/n}“不管里面的人是谁，我只希望亚空间的巫术不会削弱他感受恐惧的能力……或体验痛苦的能力。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hace una leve mueca.{/n} «Quienquiera que nos espere dentro, espero que la hechicería disforme no le haya arrebatado la capacidad de sentir miedo... ni dolor».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hace una leve mueca.{/n} «Quienquiera que nos espere dentro, espero que la hechicería disforme no le haya arrebatado la capacidad de sentir miedo... ni dolor».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schneidet eine leichte Grimasse.{/n} "Wer auch immer da drin wartet, ich hoffe, die Warp-Hexerei hat ihn nicht seiner Fähigkeit beraubt, Angst zu empfinden. Oder Schmerz."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schneidet eine leichte Grimasse.{/n} "Wer auch immer da drin wartet, ich hoffe, die Warp-Hexerei hat ihn nicht seiner Fähigkeit beraubt, Angst zu empfinden. Oder Schmerz."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはかすかに顔をしかめた。{/n}「中で待っているのが誰であれ、歪みの魔術で恐怖を感じる能力を奪われていなければいいな。それから、痛みも」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはかすかに顔をしかめた。{/n}「中で待っているのが誰であれ、歪みの魔術で恐怖を感じる能力を奪われていなければいいな。それから、痛みも」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esquisse une grimace.{/n} « J'espère que la sorcellerie du Warp n'a pas privé celui ou celle qui nous attend à l'intérieur de la capacité à éprouver de la peur. Ou de ressentir la douleur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esquisse une grimace.{/n} « J'espère que la sorcellerie du Warp n'a pas privé celui ou celle qui nous attend à l'intérieur de la capacité à éprouver de la peur. Ou de ressentir la douleur. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, hafifçe yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "İçeride bekleyen her kimse umarım öteboyut sahirliği, korkuyu veya acıyı hissetme yeteneğini elinden almamıştır."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai grimaces slightly.{/n} "Whoever is waiting inside, I hope warp sorcery has not sapped them of their ability to feel fear. Or pain."
